title: To all the people saying tahm is broken why is he not played a lot in high elo?
body:
Like that just kills any argument to tahm being broken since if he is then people would play or ban him. Like Korea which is the hardest sever to play one has him with a lower play rate then poppy.

Like champions like riven or jax have good play rates meaning you can't dismiss them like tahm.

Please just learn how to play against him instead of making posted about him being broken.
